name: maintenance, transmission network, electricity, high voltage direct current land cable | maintenance, transmission network, electricity, high voltage direct current land cable | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/25774/documentation

This dataset represents the maintenance of 1 km and year of an high voltage direct current land cable (Cu conductor 400 kV).;Literature data given for the entire lifetime per km was divided by lifetime (40 a) to get yearly values.;Source: Jorge, R., Hawkins, T.R., Hertwich, E..G (2012): Life cycle assessment of electricity transmission and distribution - part 1: power lines and cables. Int J Life Cycle Assess 17: 9-15. supplementary matierial p.15, table S14.

The activity starts with the replacement of oil and transport services for maintenance activities.

The activity ends with the disposal of displaced oil.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects

processDocumentation.timeDescription: refers to publication date of literature sources
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The scope of the underlying literature source is Europe.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Maintenance is comprised of the replacement of oil
